EmailTemplate.name: Valid Not Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Valid Fill Was Not Approved for {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Contact Ed Teller if you have questions regarding the denial for Valid Fill in this location.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Installation__c.Link} to be directed to the specific Installation record.
